item.title: Yet Another Reason to Use DuckDuckGo
item.description: I couldn’t recall a [tmux][5] command, so I quickly reached for my trusted default search engine DuckDuckGo. I typed “tmux cheat sheet” because, well, once I found an excellent one which I wanted to summon again. To my surprise, the [search result][1] included an in-page cheat sheetâ€”a good one too. It isn’t the first time that DuckDuckGo surprises me like that. Need a new GUID? [Search for it][2]. Need a quick QR code?
